note: Big shopping spree during my first solo trip without Arty. Shipping was a whopping $60

books: The Encyclopedia of Tarot, Volume I
The Classic Tales of Brer Rabbit
note: I saw the Pendragon Castle pop-up book but had a feeling that I already owned it and so put it on their hold shelf. Before checking my list, I decided to return to buy it and got several others. In fact, I did have a copy already. I'm not including it in this list as I plan to give it away

Adam Sussman had this book and I had taken a picture of it. It popped into my head, so I ordered it from the publisher in the UK. Coincidentally, the last book I ordered was exactly one year ago and also shipped internationally

books: Bridge of the Gods, Mountains of Fire

books: Origen y Evolución Sistema Constructivo Iglesias de Chiloé

note: There were several booklets about Chiloé, this one was the only one translated into English but also seemed to have the most diverse info

books: Fotografías de Martín Gusinde en Tierra del Fuego (1919–1924)

books: Know Your Toes (and Other Things to Know)

books: In a Sacred Manner We Live

books: A Kids' Guide to Building Forts

note: A saw a PDF version of this book while searching for books about terraces online. I went to the publisher's website to buy a physical copy, but the page was in Slovenian. I used a translating program to fill out my info but the form had errors so I had to use my browser's dev tools to un-disable the submit button. Remarkably, it worked and the book arrived from overseas

There were no books displayed at the front desk, but I asked the lady and she pulled a few out. Luckily for me, one of the books was about the exhibit hoped for: this one
COVID had closed the showroom of Chronicle Books and the guy at the desk said I was lucky: the receptionist has been out sick and he happened to be there for packages
Zahra was selling these. She said that one of her customers is the father of one of the authors. When I bought it, some youths in front of me said they'd recently come across the City Surf Project
